97.movie_plot: During the Vietnam War, Captain Willard is sent on a dangerous mission into Cambodia to assassinate a renegade Colonel who has set himself up as a god among a local tribe.

96.movie_plot: A woman is asked to spy on a group of Nazi friends in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?

93.movie_plot: An All-American trucker gets dragged into a centuries-old mystical battle in Chinatown.

99.movie_plot: When a reformed jewel thief is suspected of returning to his former occupation, he must ferret out the real thief in order to prove his innocence.

90.movie_plot: In the midst of the Gulf War, soldiers are kidnapped and brainwashed for sinister purposes.

89.movie_plot: A coverup and witchhunt occur after a politician accidentally kills his mistress.

102.movie_plot: A journalist is trapped in Cambodia during tyrant Pol Pot's bloody 'Year Zero' cleansing campaign, which claimed the lives of two million 'undesirable' civilians.

92.movie_plot: A graduate history student is unwittingly caught in the middle of an international conspiracy involving stolen diamonds, an exiled Nazi war criminal, and a rogue government agent.

87.movie_plot: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

108.movie_plot: Film noir parody with a detective uncovering a sinister plot. Characters from real noirs appear as scenes from various films are intercut.

111.movie_plot: A bookish CIA researcher finds all his co-workers dead, and must outwit those responsible until he figures out who he can really trust.

100.movie_plot: At the close of WWII, a young nurse tends to a badly-burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.

112.movie_plot: A woman whose husband is fighting in Vietnam falls in love with another man who suffered a paralyzing combat injury there.

101.movie_plot: The World War II phase of the career of the controversial American general, George S. Patton.

110.movie_plot: A troubled hitman seeks aid from a forger to help him get papers to China. However, the drug lord has hired replacements to finish the job, and kill the hitman.

103.movie_plot: On a South Pacific island during World War II, love blooms between a young nurse and a secretive Frenchman who's being courted for a dangerous military mission.

94.movie_plot: When his mentor is taken captive by a disgraced Arab sheik, a killer-for-hire is forced into action. His mission: kill three members of Britain's elite Special Air Service responsible for the death of his sons.

86.movie_plot: A wrongly convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a game show.

105.movie_plot: A Los Angeles male escort, who mostly caters to an older female clientèle, is accused of a murder which he did not commit.

107.movie_plot: A man searches for his missing wife after his car breaks down in the middle of the desert.

104.movie_plot: Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down a Western outlaw.

91.movie_plot: Two young men strangle their "inferior" classmate, hide his body in their apartment, and invite his friends and family to a dinner party as a means to challenge the "perfection" of their crime.

114.movie_plot: A woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in postapocalyptic Australia in search for her home-land with the help of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshipper, and a drifter named Max.

88.movie_plot: Sam Witwicky leaves the Autobots behind for a normal life. But when his mind is filled with cryptic symbols, the Decepticons target him and he is dragged back into the Transformers' war.

113.movie_plot: A private investigator is hired to discover if a "snuff film" is authentic or not.

95.movie_plot: Five medical students experiment with "near death" experiences, until the dark consequences of past tragedies begin to jeopardize their lives.

106.movie_plot: A private investigator is hired by a man who calls himself Louis Cyphre to track down a singer named Johnny Favorite. But the investigation takes an unexpected and somber turn.

109.movie_plot: In Hawaii in 1941, a private is cruelly punished for not boxing on his unit's team, while his captain's wife and second-in-command are falling in love.

98.movie_plot: During World War II, a rebellious U.S. Army Major is assigned a dozen convicted murderers to train and lead them into a mass assassination mission of German officers.

50.movie_plot: Secret Service agent Frank Horrigan couldn't save Kennedy, but he's determined not to let a clever assassin take out this president.

12.movie_plot: An employee of a corporation with a lucrative secret process is tempted to betray it. But there's more to it than that.

63.movie_plot: Humanity finds a mysterious, obviously artificial object buried beneath the Lunar surface and, with the intelligent computer H.A.L. 9000, sets off on a quest.

82.movie_plot: An African-American man is hired to find a woman, and gets mixed up in a murderous political scandal.

41.movie_plot: A young police officer must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

79.movie_plot: Nine noble families fight for control over the mythical lands of Westeros, while a forgotten race returns after being dormant for thousands of years.

2.movie_plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

53.movie_plot: When the daughter of a well-known and well-respected base commander is murdered, an undercover detective is summoned to look into the matter and finds a slew of cover-ups at West Point.

49.movie_plot: In order to foil an extortion plot, an FBI agent undergoes a facial transplant surgery and assumes the identity and physical appearance of a terrorist, but the plan turns from bad to worse when the same terrorist impersonates the FBI agent.

21.movie_plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

26.movie_plot: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

18.movie_plot: A man visits his old friend's hotel and finds a gangster running things. As a hurricane approaches, the two end up confronting each other.

22.movie_plot: Terrorists steal nuclear warheads from the U.S. military but don't count on a pilot and park ranger spoiling their plans.

34.movie_plot: A woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in postapocalyptic Australia in search for her home-land with the help of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshipper, and a drifter named Max.

73.movie_plot: In 1965, an unorthodox and irreverent DJ named Adrian Cronauer begins to shake up things when he is assigned to the U.S. Armed Services radio station in Vietnam.

28.movie_plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

44.movie_plot: In the aftermath of the Persian Gulf War, four soldiers set out to steal gold that was stolen from Kuwait, but they discover people who desperately need their help.

55.movie_plot: A secret agent is sent to Sydney, to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera".

0.movie_plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazi Germans.

61.movie_plot: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbours from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

9.movie_plot: When C.I.A. Analyst Jack Ryan interferes with an I.R.A. assassination, a renegade faction targets him and his family for revenge.

66.movie_plot: After being exiled from the most advanced town in post apocalyptic Australia, a drifter travels with a group of abandoned children to rebel against the town's queen.

72.movie_plot: An idiotic man struggles to make it through life on his own in St. Louis.

56.movie_plot: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

69.movie_plot: In Africa during World War I, a gin-swilling riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced missionary to use his boat to attack an enemy warship.

6.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi (1983)
6.movie_plot: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy a more powerful Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

52.movie_plot: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action, while attempting to liberate a twelve-year-old prostitute.

16.movie_plot: John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.

14.movie_plot: An alien takes the form of a young widow's husband and asks her to drive him from Wisconsin to Arizona. The government tries to stop them.

43.movie_plot: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

11.movie_plot: A freelancing former U.S. Intelligence Agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by the Irish and the Russians.

45.movie_plot: After a simple jewelry heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

78.movie_plot: Hijackers seize the plane carrying the President of the United States and his family, but he - an ex-soldier - works from hiding to defeat them.

38.movie_plot: An impoverished woman who has been forced to choose between a privileged life with her wealthy aunt and her journalist lover, befriends an American heiress. When she discovers the heiress is attracted to her own lover and is dying, she sees a chance to have both the privileged life she cannot give up and the lover she cannot live without.

35.movie_plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced cyborg.

10.movie_plot: The world's top bodyguard gets a new client, a hit man who must testify at the International Criminal Court. They must put their differences aside and work together to make it to the trial on time.

7.movie_plot: In November 1984, the Soviet Union's best submarine captain in their newest sub violates orders and heads for the USA. Is he trying to defect or to start a war?

70.movie_plot: In the world ravaged by the greenhouse effect and overpopulation, an NYPD detective investigates the murder of a big company CEO.

81.movie_plot: A small-time conman has torn loyalties between his estranged mother and new girlfriend--both of whom are high-stakes grifters with their own angles to play.

85.movie_plot: A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a fourteen-year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him.

77.movie_plot: A very rich and successful playboy amuses himself by stealing artwork, but may have met his match in a seductive detective.

62.movie_plot: The staff of an army hospital in the Korean war find that laughter is the best way to deal with their situation.

23.movie_plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

75.movie_plot: A man begins to suspect his neighbors are not what they appear to be and their secrets could be deadly.

76.movie_plot: A recently released ex-con gets involved in a fake kidnapping scheme that turns very real.

46.movie_plot: Dirty Harry is on the trail of vigilante cops who are not above going beyond the law to kill the city's undesirables.

39.movie_plot: As corruption grows in 1950s LA, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

36.movie_plot: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

1.movie_plot: A boy who communicates with spirits that don't know they're dead seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

83.movie_plot: Set at the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, explore a world in which every human appetite, no matter how noble or depraved, can be indulged without consequence.

4.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999)
4.movie_plot: Two Jedi Knights escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their old glory.

20.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
20.movie_plot: After the rebels are overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda. His friends accept shelter from a questionable ally as Darth Vader hunts them in a plan to capture Luke.

29.movie_plot: In order to ruin a western town, a corrupt politician appoints a black Sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.

84.movie_plot: A man struggles with memories of his past, including a wife he cannot remember, in a nightmarish world with no sun.

25.movie_plot: A young soldier in Vietnam faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.

30.movie_plot: Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's turned into one huge lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a river-rafting trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.

3.movie_plot: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

32.movie_plot: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as a distress call, its landing on the source moon finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform, and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

40.movie_plot: An exploration of how completely different the television series is from the film. The cast and filmmakers underwent quite a change in order to create the film X Files, The (1998). We are ...

48.movie_plot: In Casablanca in December 1941, a cynical American expatriate encounters a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

64.movie_plot: In 1988, Earth makes the first contact with an alien civilization. In 1991, these aliens, known as Newcomers, slowly begin to be integrated into human society after three years of quarantine.

68.movie_plot: 57 years later, Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team during her hypersleep. The moon from the original movie has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will that be enough?

37.movie_plot: Two victims of traumatized childhoods become lovers and psychopathic serial murderers irresponsibly glorified by the mass media.

74.movie_plot: A married man's one-night stand comes back to haunt him when that lover begins to stalk him and his family.

31.movie_plot: A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.

71.movie_plot: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

33.movie_plot: John McClane, officer of the NYPD, tries to save his wife Holly Gennaro and several others that were taken hostage by German terrorist Hans Gruber during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

19.movie_plot: Adaptation of James Jones' autobiographical 1962 novel, focusing on the conflict at Guadalcanal during the second World War.

47.movie_plot: A professional hitman and hitwoman fall in love.

5.movie_plot: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or does he?

80.movie_plot: A violent, suspended police detective investigates a brutal murder, in which a manipulative and seductive woman could be involved.

51.movie_plot: A young lawyer joins a prestigious law firm only to discover that it has a sinister dark side.

27.movie_plot: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt lead by a seasoned US Marshall.

13.movie_plot: A British team is sent to cross occupied Greek territory and destroy the massive German gun emplacement that commands a key sea channel.

8.movie_plot: Extreme measures are necessary to contain an epidemic of a deadly airborne virus. But how extreme, exactly?

42.movie_plot: A hapless New York advertising executive is mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and is pursued across the country while he looks for a way to survive.

60.movie_plot: Captain Picard, with the help of long presumed dead Captain Kirk, must stop a renegade scientist willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter an energy ribbon.

67.movie_plot: Hamlet, Prince of Denmark, returns home to find his father murdered and his mother remarrying the murderer, his uncle. Meanwhile, war is brewing.

54.movie_plot: A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a fourteen-year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him.

24.movie_plot: An honest New York cop named Frank Serpico blows the whistle on rampant corruption in the force only to have his comrades turn against him.

59.movie_name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb (1963)
59.movie_plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

65.movie_plot: When love drive you Mad 2 the Max...

58.movie_plot: A drama critic learns on his wedding day that his beloved maiden aunts are homicidal maniacs, and that insanity runs in his family.

15.movie_plot: The life of a Russian physician and poet who, although married to another, falls in love with a political activist's wife and experiences hardship during the First World War and then the October Revolution.

17.movie_plot: A lawyer becomes a target by a corrupt politician and his NSA goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a serious politically motivated crime.

57.movie_plot: Rufus T. Firefly is named president/dictator of bankrupt Freedonia and declares war on neighboring Sylvania over the love of wealthy Mrs. Teasdale.
